text: Ultimate Brain is a British game show on CBBC about science. It is hosted by Duncan Wisbey as Dr. Brain, a monkey scientist and stars Imran Yusuf as Guinea Pig (also known as GP).http://www.licensemag.com/license-global/cbbc-orders- more-ultimate-brain Series 1 began on 26 June 2014, series 2 began on 15 August 2015 with a new set and series 3 began on 23 July 2016. It is Zig Zag Productions' first children's series. ==Format== Three teams compete in each episode. Two teams (green and yellow) are made up of 10–12 year old children. One team (blue) is made up of 'celebrities', often from another CBBC show. The teams compete in various different scientific challenges and quizzes. The winning team take home the Ultimate Brain trophy. ==Cast== * Duncan Wisbey as Dr. Brain * Imran Yusuf as Guinea Pig (GP) ==Episodes== ===Series 1 (2014)=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; margin:auto; background:#FFFFF;" |- ! scope="col" style="background:#69AFFF; color:#000;"| No. in series ! scope="col" style="background:#69AFFF; color:#000;" | No. in season ! scope="col" style="background:#69AFFF; color:#000;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background:#69AFFF; color:#000;" | Original air datehttps://www.comedy.co.uk/tv/diddy_tv/ |} ===Series 2 (2015)=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; margin:auto; background:#00000;" |- ! scope="col" style="background:#F2973C; color:#000;"| No. in series ! scope="col" style="background:#F2973C; color:#000;" | No. in season ! scope="col" style="background:#F2973C; color:#000;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background:#F2973C; color:#000;" | Original air date |} ===Series 3 (2016)=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; margin:auto; background:#00000;" |- ! scope="col" style="background:#66FF00; color:#000;"| No. in series ! scope="col" style="background:#66FF00; color:#000;" | No. in season ! scope="col" style="background:#66FF00; color:#000;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background:#66FF00; color:#000;" | Original air date |} ==References== ==External links== Category:2014 British television series debuts Category:2016 British television series endings Category:2010s British game shows Category:BBC children's television shows Category:BBC high definition shows Category:BBC television game shows Category:English-language television shows
